tweet_text: @Trevor_McDowell @DuggDawg4Life @AdamSchefter I’m sorry your reading comprehension is lacking. Yes I did play. I didn’t say they can’t celebrate. tweet_text: @wastelandmaki that's the thing about gansey that gets me so bad. it's very easy to call him selfish, but he really isn't. he gives so much of himself away to people around him, and yet he's so hesitant to do it too. it's always so painful for him to show love it kills me.
